snippet: The arrest of Samuel Rahamin Topaz, of Fort Lee, was the fourth targeting a ring of young men suspected of sympathizing with the terrorist group.
abstract: Samuel Rahamin Topaz of Fort Lee, NJ, is charged with planning to travel abroad to support Islamic State; arrest of 21-year-old is latest in string of young men in New York metropolitan area who are suspected of sympathizing with group.
lead_paragraph: The arrest of Samuel Rahamin Topaz, of Fort Lee, was the fourth targeting a ring of young men suspected of sympathizing with the terrorist group.

headline.main: New Jersey Man Is Charged With Planning to Aid ISIS
headline.print_headline: Man Accused in New Jersey of Planning Aid to ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
